content: I just noticed our ballot version has an extra external link indicator icon in the yellow box: image.png
I'm not sure if this is an IG publisher or template issue...if someone can direct me I'm happy to log a GitHub issue against the relevant repo
I think that's appropriate - it's a link external to this specification
I think this is because of some changes in the template - there was a css that added those icons to any external link. I'm not sure we caught all the places where that icon is now duplicate.
@Jose Costa Teixeira do I need to log a GitHub issue?
I don't know where this comes from. The base template seems fins. so this could be an issue on the HL7 template
it shows up in the IHE template too image.png
oh, then it is in the base template :)
Oh, missed that this was a duplicate. That will be in the publisher, not the template, as the publisher injects the yellow bar
and the template adds the other icon - which one do we keep?
oh, my base template IG did not have it
We keep the template one. The publisher should no longer be adding that icon anywhere.
So we'll need to submit pull requests to fix the publisher wherever it's still spitting out that icon
is the template correct now? It was adding it in error., or missing it in places. But you can't just remove this, since this code runs on old IGs as well
